$comment: JSON Schema specifying what configuration options are allowed in typewriter.toml files.

path.$comment: A directory path relative to this typewriter.toml file, specifying where this language client should be output.

name.$comment: Which language to use when generating clients.

trackingPlans.$comment: Which Tracking Plans to sync locally, to be used for client generation

tokenCommand.$comment: A shell command that must produce a Segment API token as its only output. If not specified, your environment's TYPEWRITER_TOKEN will be used.
